pages.name: posts/cyanogen.html
pages.title: Trying out Android 6.0 Marshmallow - CyanogenMod 13
pages.summary:
Some notes about Android 6.0 - CyanogenMod, new features, improvements on the new version of the Android OS.

I tried it by installing CyanogenMod 13, a fork made from AOSP, some differences can be found from Android on commercial devices

pages.name: posts/netflix-blocks-vpns.html
pages.title: Netflix is now bloking VPN services
pages.summary: Now you can't watch your films and series in Netflix if you are using a VPN. This services were usually used for avoiding geographical restrictions on content, you'll have to stick with your country's catalog.

pages.name: posts/comprando-al-otro-lado-del-mundo.html
pages.title: Haciendo compras por internet en diversas partes del mundo
pages.summary: Notas sobre mis experiencias comprando por internet pequeños gadgets a precio barato de diversas partes del mundo. Formas de pago, envío y lugares donde comprar.

pages.name: posts/encuestas-presidenciales.html
pages.title: Visualización de resultados de encuestas presidenciales.
pages.summary: He creado una visualización de los resultados de las encuestas de intención de voto para las elecciones presidenciales Perú 2016. El gráfico es dinámico y puede ser insertado en otras páginas para compartir.

pages.name: posts/ray-tracing-in-one-weekend.html
pages.title: Making a ray tracer as a weekend project
pages.summary: Review of Peter Shirley's mini-book on how to make a ray tracer as your weekend project. I also mention my experience following the book and building a ray tracer from scratch.
